original: Justin Waye was a star employee. He was always known to follow all of Stefanic Dracogen's rules and regulations. He worked in an entirely different department and wasn't supposed to be anywhere near the refinery walkway. Dracogen has no idea why he was in the refinery before the accident.
translation: 贾斯汀·维耶是个模范工人。严格遵守斯蒂芬尼克·德拉科根定下的规矩条令。他在另一个毫不相干的部门工作，根本不该接近炼油步道。德拉科根也不知道为什么事故前贾斯汀会出现在炼油厂。
